title: Simple colorimetric paper-based test strip for point-of-use quality testing of ethanol-based hand sanitizers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8188-8194
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08110A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aya M. El-Hassanein, Fotouh R. Mansour, Sherin F. Hammad, Aya A. Abdella
A novel, simple, affordable, and reliable colorimetric paper-based analytical device was developed for the point-of-use quality testing of ethanol-based hand sanitizers, mainly against adulteration by water.
